titles: To the right reuerend father in God, my verie good lord and brother, the lord bishop of London right reuerend father in God, my verie good lord, I haue receiued from His Maiesty his princely letters, written in fauor of the inhabitants of the towne of Wesell, the tenor whereof here ensueth.
author: Church of England. Province of Canterbury. Archbishop (1611-1633 : Abbot)
Abbot, George, 1562-1633.
King, John, 1559?-1621.
notes: For collections to alleviate suffering caused by Spanish occupation of that city, 7 June 1618.
Dated and signed at end: Lambehith: Iune 25. 1618. G. Cant."
Undated recommendation from the bishop of London added at end.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Church of England --  Charitable contributions --  Early works to 1800.
